name: Chickpea And Black Bean Salad
description: A healthy and satisfying salad made with protein-packed chickpeas and black beans, mixed with fresh veggies and a zesty dressing.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, black beans, red onion, cherry tomatoes, parsley, and mint.
In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, vinegar, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat.
Divide the salad between serving bowls and top each with 1 tablespoon of crumbled feta cheese.
